alert.note: Alert for Morgan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:43AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MORGAN COUNTY THROUGH 1015 AM CDT... At 943 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Otterville, or 12 miles west of Tipton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Syracuse and Florence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
